fields.name: Large Group Makkah Ziyarat Tour – Minibus (15 Guests)
fields.description:
Book Your Large Group Makkah Ziyarat Tour  with Minibus for 15

 

Load up your group of up to 15 in a big luxury minibus for this large group Makkah ziyarat tour. Choose with a guide for lively insights or without for casual talks as you head to ziyarat places in Makkah, including Haram Sharif and Jabal al-Hira. Enjoy a shared large group Makkah ride packed with views and quick stops at sacred Makkah sights. Perfect for clubs or big families wanting a minibus Makkah tour for 15 people. Book now to turn your outing into a sacred large group adventure.

 

Your 3-Hour Large Group Makkah Ziyarat Tour Route

Pick up from your hotel and return there in a spacious AC luxury minibus. Your guide (if chosen) keeps the energy high for the group on this sacred large group adventure.

 

Hour 1: Haram Sharif and Group Views

Drive to the Makkah Haram Sharif for a group gaze at the Grand Mosque. Park close, step out for a collective photo, and if with a guide, learn its story in pilgrimage tourism, Saudi Arabia.

 

Hour 2: Jabal al-Hira and Jabal al-Thawr Group Stops

Visit Jabal al-Hira for the revelation cave, with plenty of space for the group to gather and listen. Then stop at Jabal al-Thawr to point out Prophet Muhammad’s refuge during the Hijra, sparking group chats.

 

Hour 3: Jannat al-Mualla and Group Return

Stop at Jannat al-Mualla cemetery to see graves like Khadijah’s, with time for the group to pause and share thoughts. Drive back to your hotel with the guide (if chosen), wrapping up tales on ziyarat places in Makkah.

 

Why Our Minibus Makkah Tour 15 People Suits Large Groups in 

This large group Makkah ziyarat tour carries up to 15 travelers in a luxury minibus with AC. Go with a guide for lively stories or without for casual exploration at ziyarat places in Makkah. Dodge crowds at sacred Makkah sights and roll along at your crowd’s rhythm. Great for teams or gatherings wanting a shared large group makkah ride. Book to spark those shared stories on a sacred large group adventure.
fields.overview:
Hassle-Free Pickup for Your Large Group Makkah Ziyarat Tour

 

We pick you up from your hotel within 9 km in Makkah City, perfect for tourists and Umrah pilgrims. Be ready on time for a smooth start to your shared large group Makkah ride. Our team ensures a timely and comfortable pickup for the entire group.

  • Air-conditioned luxury minibus

  • Other personal expenses, like group souvenirs

fields.name: Makkah Private Ziyarat Tour – Luxury Car (3 Guests)
fields.description:
Book Your Private Makkah Ziyarat Tour by Luxury Car for 3

 

Step into a cozy luxury car for this private Makkah ziyarat tour, designed for just 3 guests. Choose with a guide for lively tales or without for calm reflection as you head to ziyarat places in Makkah, including Haram Sharif and Jabal al-Hira. Enjoy a peaceful Makkah drive tailored for small groups seeking a luxury Makkah tour for small group. It’s a perfect way to connect with the sacred Makkah journey. Reserve your spot today.

 

Your 3-Hour Private Makkah Ziyarat Tour Plan

Begin and end at your hotel in a plush AC car. Pick with a guide for insights or without for your own pace on this sacred Makkah journey.

 

Hour 1: Haram Sharif and Surrounding Peace

Drive to the Makkah Haram Sharif for a quiet view of the Grand Mosque. Park nearby, take a short walk, and if with a guide, learn its deep roots in pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia.

 

Hour 2: Jabal al-Hira and Jabal al-Thawr History

Visit Jabal al-Hira, where the Quran’s first words were revealed, and climb a few steps for a view. Stop at Jabal al-Thawr to hear about Prophet Muhammad’s refuge during the Hijra, or chat freely without a guide.

 

Hour 3: Jannat al-Mualla and Return Trip

Stop at Jannat al-Mualla cemetery, a resting place for early Muslims, to see graves like Khadijah’s. Drive back to your hotel with time to reflect or ask questions on ziyarat places in Makkah.

 

Why Our Luxury Makkah Tour for Small Groups Stands Out

This private Makkah ziyarat tour fits 3 guests in a luxury car with AC. Go with a guide for lively stories or without for calm exploration at the ziyarat places in Makkah. Avoid crowds at sacred Makkah spots and set your own pace. Ideal for families craving a peaceful Makkah drive. Book to make it yours.

We pick you up from your hotel within 9 km in Makkah City, perfect for tourists and Umrah pilgrims. Be ready on time for a smooth start to your peaceful Makkah drive. Our team ensures a timely and comfortable pickup.

Join our 7-night, 8-day umrah packages for a spiritual umrah journey in Makkah and Madinah. Perfect for non-English speakers, enjoy cheap umrah deals makkah with guided ziyarat tours makkah madinah. Connect with faith at pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia and book your sacred trip now! Explore More Ziyarat Tours with Dream Ziarah

 

Day-by-Day Itinerary

 

Day 1: Arrival in Makkah - Start Your Umrah Packages  

Arrive in Makkah and settle into your cozy hotel near the Makkah Haram Sharif. Perform your first umrah with guided ziyarat tours makkah, feeling the spiritual umrah journey begin at this holy site, saudi arabia. Rest and enjoy your sacred start!

 

Day 2: Makkah - Daily Prayers at Grand Mosque

Join daily prayers at the Makkah Haram Sharif with fellow pilgrims. Enjoy the spiritual umrah journey with time for quiet reflection at this key pilgrimage tourism destination in Saudi Arabia. Make your Umrah packages special!

 

Day 3: Makkah - Ziyarat Tours and 2nd Umrah

Explore the ziyarat places in Makkah with guided ziyarat tours, visiting historical spots like the Cave of Hira. Perform your second umrah, deepening your spiritual umrah journey at the holy sites in Saudi Arabia. Book now!

 

Day 4: Makkah - Daily Prayers and Free Time

Pray again at the Makkah Haram Sharif, feeling unity with pilgrims. Use free time to explore or reflect during your umrah packages. Enjoy this peaceful stop at holy sites in Saudi Arabia!

 

Day 5: Makkah - Taif Ziyarat Places and 3rd Umrah

Take a day trip to Taif ziyarat places, seeing the Abdullah Ibn Abbas Mosque. Perform your third umrah after this fun visit, enhancing your spiritual umrah journey from pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia. Reserve today!

 

Day 6: Travel to Madinah - Next Umrah Stop

Leave Makkah and travel to Madinah, checking into your hotel. Prepare for the next part of your umrah packages, enjoying the shift to another holy site in Saudi Arabia. Rest well!

 

Day 7: Madinah - Visit Rawza Mubarak

Explore the Prophet’s Mosque and Rawza Mubarak with guided ziyarat tours in Makkah and Madinah. Feel the calm and history of this spiritual umrah journey spot. Book your pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia tour now!

 

Day 8: Departure from Madinah

Check out and leave Madinah for Italy, carrying memories of your umrah packages. Reflect on your spiritual umrah journey at the Makkah Haram Sharif and the Madinah Prophet’s Mosque. Safe travels!

 

Why Pick Our Cheap Umrah Deals in Makkah?

Trust us for Umrah packages with guided ziyarat tours to Makkah and Madinah. We offer help for non-English speakers, cozy hotels near holy sites in Saudi Arabia, and free cancellation. Book your spiritual umrah journey today!
fields.overview:
Smooth Exit from Your Umrah Packages

 

  • Check-out: Finish checking out from your hotel on the last day.

  • Transfer to Airport: Ride comfortably from your stay to the airport.

  • Flight Information: Board your flight, taking home memories of your spiritual umrah journey.

  • Farewell: Say goodbye to Makkah Haram Sharif and Madinah Prophet’s Mosque, feeling the pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia.
fields.inclution:
What’s Included in Your Umrah Packages 

 

  • Accommodation:  Stay in selected hotels within 700m of the Makkah Haram Sharif and Madinah Prophet’s Mosque.
  • Visa:  Get your umrah/tourist visa with our help.
  • Meals: Enjoy lunch and dinner daily during your spiritual umrah journey.
  • Air Ticket: Fly Roam-Jeddah-Roam with us.
  • Guidance: Use our guidebook and Moallem's assistance for holy sites in Saudi Arabia.
  • Luggage: Carry 20 kg per person.
  • Transportation: Includes airport to Makkah, Makkah ziyarat tour, Makkah to Madinah, Madinah ziyarat tour, and Madinah to airport transfers
fields.exclusion:
What’s Not Included in Umrah Packages 

 

  • Breakfast and drinks
  • Other personal expenses
fields.cancellation:
Easy Cancellation for Umrah Packages

We charge a 100% fee if you cancel 1 day or less before your Umrah packages start. Plan to avoid losing your cheap Umrah deals Makkah booking!

fields.name: Book Hajj Packages with Guided Hajj Tours Makkah Madinah
fields.description:
Book Hajj Packages with Guided Hajj Tours Makkah Madinah

 

Join our hajj packages for a sacred hajj journey in Makkah and Madinah. Perfect for non-English speakers, enjoy cheap hajj deals makkah with guided hajj tours makkah madinah. Connect with faith at pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia and book your sacred trip now! Explore More Ziyarat Tours.

 

Day-by-Day Itinerary

 

Day 1-5: Arrival in Makkah - Prepare for Hajj Packages  

Arrive in Makkah and settle into your hotel near the Makkah Haram Sharif. Perform Umrah and daily prayers, feeling the sacred hajj journey begin at this holy site in Saudi Arabia. Rest and get ready for your hajj packages!

 

Day 6: Arafat and Hajj Rituals at the Grand Mosque

Join the key hajj rituals on the 6th day at Arafat and Makkah Haram Sharif with fellow pilgrims. Enjoy the sacred hajj journey with time for reflection at this pilgrimage tourism in Saudi Arabia. Make your hajj packages special!

 

Day 7-10: Mina and Muzdalifah - Guided Hajj Tours

Explore Mina and Muzdalifah with guided hajj tours, Makkah, Madinah, visiting historical spots like Jamarat. Perform stoning rituals, deepening your sacred hajj journey at holy sites in Saudi Arabia. Book now!

 

Day 11-15: Madinah Visit and Prayers

Pray at Madinah Prophet’s Mosque, feeling unity with pilgrims. Use free time to explore or reflect during your hajj packages. Enjoy this peaceful stop at holy sites in Saudi Arabia!

 

Day 16-20: Extended Rituals and Taif Day Trip (24-Day Option)

Take a day trip to Taif ziyarat places, seeing the Abdullah Ibn Abbas Mosque. Perform extra rituals, enhancing your sacred hajj journey from pilgrimage tourism, Saudi Arabia. Reserve today!

 

Day 21-24: Departure from Madinah (24-Day) or Earlier (14-Day)

Check out and leave Madinah for Italy, carrying memories of your hajj packages. Reflect on your sacred hajj journey at the Makkah Haram Sharif and Madinah Prophet’s Mosque. Safe travels!

 

Why Pick Our Cheap Hajj Deals in Makkah?

Trust us for Hajj packages with guided Hajj tours to Makkah and Madinah. We offer help for non-English speakers, cozy hotels near holy sites in Saudi Arabia, and free cancellation until March 30th. Book your sacred hajj journey today!

fields.name: FAQ
fields.description:
What is included in Dream Ziarah's Umrah packages?

Dream Ziarah's Umrah packages typically include round-trip flights, accommodation in 5-star hotels near the Two Holy Mosques, transportation between Makkah and Madinah, visa processing, and guided Ziyarat tours to significant Islamic sites.

Can I customize my Umrah or Ziyarat tour package?

Yes, Dream Ziarah offers customizable packages to cater to individual preferences. You can choose the duration of your stay, select specific Ziyarat sites to visit, and opt for private or group tours based on your requirements.

Are English-speaking guides available for Ziyarat tours?

Yes, Dream Ziarah provides English-speaking guides for Ziyarat tours to ensure clear communication and a comprehensive understanding of the historical and spiritual significance of each site.

What are the must-visit Ziyarat places in Makkah and Madinah?

Key Ziyarat sites include:

 

1. Makkah: Haram Sharif, Maqam Ibrahim, Zamzam Well, Cave of Hira, Masjid Ayesha, Masjid Jinn.

 

2. Madinah: Prophet’s Mosque (Rawza Mubarak), Quba Mosque, Qiblatain Mosque, Uhud Mountain, Masjid Al-Jinn.

How long do Ziyarat tours typically last?

Ziyarat tours usually range from 3 to 6 hours, depending on the number of sites included. Full-day tours to places like Taif may extend up to 8 hours.

Is transportation provided during the Ziyarat tours?

Yes, Dream Ziarah arranges comfortable transportation for all Ziyarat tours, ensuring a convenient and safe journey between sites.

Can I perform multiple Umrahs during my stay?

Yes, Dream Ziarah's packages allow for multiple Umrah performances. The itinerary is designed to accommodate additional Umrah rituals alongside Ziyarat tours.

Are there special packages for Ramadan or the Hajj season?

Yes, Dream Ziarah offers special packages during Ramadan and Hajj seasons, providing enhanced services and accommodations to cater to the increased demand during these peak times.

How can I book a package with Dream Ziarah?

Bookings can be made directly through the Dream Ziarah website. Simply select your desired package, provide the necessary details, and complete the booking process.

What support is available before and during the trip?

Dream Ziarah offers 24/7 customer support to assist with any queries or concerns before and during your trip, ensuring a smooth and fulfilling pilgrimage experience.
